constraints.name: query_count_constraint
constraints.description: 查询次数上限为 57 次

constraints.name: subarray_length_fixed
constraints.description: 每次查询的子数组长度固定为 k

constraints.name: query_range_validity
constraints.description: 查询的起始位置 i 必须满足 1 ≤ i ≤ n - k + 1

constraints.name: even_number_constraint
constraints.description: 输入的 n 和 k 都必须是正偶数

constraints.name: array_size_relation
constraints.description: 数组长度 n 满足 1 ≤ k ≤ n ≤ k^2 ≤ 2500
